DigitalIOItem.Name: WarningField_S1
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Warning Field from Scanner B1 is free.

DigitalIOItem.Name: WarningField_S2
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Warning Field from Scanner B4 is free.

DigitalIOItem.Name: WarningFieldComplete
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Warning Field from every Scanner is free.

DigitalIOItem.Name: ProtectionField_S1
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Protection Field from Scanner B1 is free

DigitalIOItem.Name: ProtectionField_S2
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Protection Field from Scanner B4 is free

DigitalIOItem.Name: ProtectionFieldComplete
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Protection Field from eyery Scanner is free

DigitalIOItem.Name: ActiveScanField
DigitalIOItem.Description: Information witch Scanfield number is already active from 0 to 15 (16 Cases).

DigitalIOItem.Name: ProtectionFieldMuted
DigitalIOItem.Description: Information if the protection fields are active or not. State is "true" means they are inactive.

DigitalIOItem.Name: LastActiveScanField
DigitalIOItem.Description: Number of the last active scanfield before protection field error.

IOGroup.Description: Contains necessary information from the laser scanners of the AGV
